channel.title: Time Is Money on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Time Is Money on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: When Time Became Money
item.description: Editor’s note: Hey guys! Ernie here, handing the floor over once again to Andrew Egan, who last showed up on Tedium to tell us all about photo processing. Today, he’s talking about the value of time. Today in Tedium: Some phrases are so ingrained in the common lexicon that it’s almost impossible to imagine a time without them. Idioms, turns-of-phrase, colloquialisms, whatever you want to call them, take generations to develop.
